styles.name: widgets_theme
header_theme
styles.value:
.d-ui-widget-header, .d-ui-widget-header > a { color: #525252; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: none; text-transform: none; }
.d-ui-widget-header { background-image: none; background-color: #e3e3e3; }.d-ui-widget-header,.ui-widget-header,.d-rte-panes>.d-menu.toolbar,.d-button {border-color:#e3e3e3;background-image:none;background-color:#f7f7f7;}

styles.name: content_theme
hover_states_theme
styles.value:
.d-ui-widget.d-state-hover, .d-ui-widget-header.d-state-hover, .d-item.d-state-hover, .d-node-content > .d-state-hover { background-image: none; background-color: #fafafa; }
    .d-ui-widget.d-state-hover, .d-ui-widget-header.d-state-hover, .d-ui-widget-header.d-state-hover > a, .d-item.d-state-hover, .d-node-content > .d-state-hover, .ui-state-hover { box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px #919191 inset; -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px #919191 inset; -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px #919191 inset; text-shadow: none; }

styles.name: active_states_theme
disable_states_theme
styles.value:
.d-ui-widget.d-state-disable, .d-ui-widget:disabled, .d-ui-widget.d-state-disable *, .d-ui-widget-content.d-state-disable, .d-ui-widget-content:disabled, .d-ui-widget-header.d-state-disable, .d-ui-widget-header.d-state-disable > a, .d-node.d-state-disable .d-node-content, .d-node.d-state-disable .d-node-content a, .d-checkbox.d-state-disable, .d-radio.d-state-disable { color: #8a8a8a; }
    .d-ui-widget.d-state-disable, .d-ui-widget:disabled, .d-ui-widget-header.d-state-disable, .d-ui-widget.d-state-disable .d-ui-widget-content, .d-ui-widget-content.d-state-disable { background-color: #eeeeee; background-image: none; }

styles.name: error_states_theme
